title: mozy 1.8.6.21
description:
Mozy (version 1.8.6.21) will allow you to backup up to 4GB worth of data online for free. Here is a list of features from their site:

* 4GB of free, secure storage (Or go Unlimited for $4.95/month!)
* Open/locked file support
* Block-level differential backup
* 128-bit SSL support (to secure your data during transport)
* 448-bit Blowfish encryption (to secure your data on our server)
* Continuous or scheduled backup options

Oh, also: If you decide to try Mozy out, feel free to use this link to register (it has my referral code). If you do, then both you and I will get an extra 2GB free Extra. ;) Thats 4 Gigs of Free Backup Storage.
  <a href="
https://mozy.com/?code=7CW7F1" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://mozy.com/?code=7CW7F1</a>

Have fun!
